big_text_intro.dialog: |C3|[VAL2] случайно повстречалась с монстром. Это была...

step1_ask_generic.dialog_rand1: |wave|[VAL1] здесь!|norm||L|Я получила много радостей, увидев тебя!
step1_ask_generic.dialog_rand2: |wave|Это моя подруга [VAL1]!|norm||L|Встреча с тобой даёт мне много радостей!

step1_ask_generic.dialog_rand1: Но я ОЧЕНЬ грустная сейчас, и мне требую помощь.
step1_ask_generic.dialog_rand2: Но я сделала плохую вещь, и нуждаю в помощи в исправлении.

step1_ask_generic.dialog_rand1: Зарадена предлагала мне дружбу, но я отплатила   |shake|жестокостью!
step1_ask_generic.dialog_rand2: Зарадена поделилась со мной люблением, но я знала только   |shake|резание!

step1_ask_generic_twins.dialog: Я встретила Зараден-сестродственниц, но я сделала плохое.

step1_ask_generic_twins.dialog_rand1: Одна из Зараден предлагала мне дружбу, но я отплатила   |shake|жестокостью!
step1_ask_generic_twins.dialog_rand2: Одна из Зараден поделилась со мной люблением, но я знала только   |shake|резание!

step1_leave_generic.dialog_rand1: This will be delivered most speedingly.
step1_leave_generic.dialog_rand2: This will give the Zaraden forgetfulness of my crimes.
step1_leave_generic.dialog_rand3: This will give the Zaraden forgivingness of my sins.

step1_leave_generic.dialog_rand2: I'm expecting many adulations for me.
step1_leave_generic.dialog_rand3: The Zaraden will give many praisings to me.

step1_leave_generic_twins.dialog: If this delivering can bring the forgivingness, then that means-

step1_leave_generic_twins.dialog_rand1: There will be many complimentations from both Zaradens.
step1_leave_generic_twins.dialog_rand2: There will be great adulations from both Zaradens.
step1_leave_generic_twins.dialog_rand3: There will be BIG praisings from both Zaradens.

step1_ask_B_sandrome.dialog: The Zaraden gave me the BIG happiness.
But also many regretings for the violences I have done.
A lucky day for me!|L||!|One of these gifts will bring many forgivings.

step1_leave_B_sandrome.dialog: The Zaraden will give many praisings and adulations for this!

step1_ask_B_scrambla_defect.dialog: [VAL3], can you help us right now?
We want to give something to dis Zaraden.
She has da super pretty hair, and da super pretty face, and uh-
But we're afraid to give dis gifts to her.
That Zaraden had many offerings of friendship-
But I paid only with the violence!
There will be many punishmentations for me!
No, dis Zaraden is not mad at you.
Give her our gifts and you will see.

step1_leave_B_scrambla_defect.dialog: Are you sure there will be forgivings?
I see many heart explosionings coming from your floating eyes!

step2_intro_generic.dialog_rand1: A special delivering for the Zaraden!
step2_intro_generic.dialog_rand2: I bring the deliverings of gifts!
step2_intro_generic.dialog_rand3: You will get many receivings today!

step2_intro_single.dialog: [VAL1] was sending a gift to you!

step2_intro_single.dialog_rand1: I have achieved the completioning of this quest.
step2_intro_single.dialog_rand2: I was transportationing this gift for your mercy.

step2_intro_single.dialog: You will forget my many stabbings, yes?

step2_intro_multi.dialog: [VAL1] was sending many gifts to you.
I was transportationing these gifts for your mercy.
You will forgive my many serrations, yes?

step2_intro_self.dialog: I am very sorry for the many attempted stabbings.
I bring the delivering of this gift to you!
There will be forgivingness for me, yes?

step2_intro_worry.dialog: I bring deliverings of gifts from [VAL1]!
She feels many concernings about you.
|shake|But I know you are very strong!
And you have forgivingness for anyone who gives you many stabbings, yes?

step2_intro_crush.dialog: |wave|I saw many heart explosionings from her eyes.
I was feeling much concerning about it first.
But it seemed to bring her many happiness.
Delivering this gift will bring forgivings for my past stabbings, yes?

step2_leave_blank.dialog: You want me to forgive you?
But all you did was give me cuddles, and then run away.

step2_leave_defect.dialog: From the most perfect Veyeral, to the world's longest hydrome.

step2_leave_twins.dialog: We can't keep the giant worm!
I am very good at transportationing.

step2_leave_devil.dialog: Uhhh... You'll be the touring vehicle!
The rest of the band will ride on top of you as we |shake|conquer the world!

step2_leave_default.dialog: I'll take that as a yes.

step2_leave_B_sandrome_defect.dialog: You came looking for me, just to apologize?
I am begging for any forgivings.
I don't know what I'm supposed to say.
New feelings cause my darling Defect to malfunction.

step2_intro_B_scrambla_defect.dialog: I bring a very special delivering for the Zaraden!
Scramby was really really sending these gifts for you!

step2_leave_B_scrambla_defect.dialog: But why didn't she bring these to me herself?
|wave|I have some knowings of the secret.
It's worse than I feared.|!||L|She was truly smitten by my perfect form.
I'll have to let her down gently.
